message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal for both of us! Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but I'm only able to go up to $12000 at this point. Let me know if you're willing to work with that.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for a price closer to my initial proposal. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
